info.title: getBlockTransactions example
info.description: This is an API example for getBlockTransactions, a method to retrieve transactions from a specific block in the TON blockchain.

parameters.name: seqno
parameters.description: The sequence number of the block

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The maximum number of transactions to return

workchain.description: The workchain ID of the block

shard.description: The shard ID of the block

seqno.description: The sequence number of the block

root_hash.description: The root hash of the block

file_hash.description: The file hash of the block

account.description: The account address involved in the transaction

lt.description: The logical time of the transaction

incomplete.description: Indicates if the returned list is incomplete
